title: Friday Fun Show! Browns-Steelers TNF Recap + Final Thoughts for Week 3
itunes:title: Friday Fun Show! Browns-Steelers TNF Recap + Final Thoughts for Week 3
description:
A virtual room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal share their final thoughts before a weekend of football action. First, we recap the Browns-Steelers Thursday night matchup. Some listeners ask questions via the YouTube comments, and Gregg shares the Chris Wesseling All Star team. We take MORE feedback and questions from the live listeners, and finally hit the last nuts and bolts leading into Week 3 with Heroes of the Week Predictions.

The Friday Fun Show airs live on YouTube at 10am PT/3pm ET/6pm BST every Friday.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
